tool_description: This API helps to query for live cricket scores, commentary, latest cricket news and editorials, schedules of upcoming matches, rankings, stats, records, etc
name: Unofficial Cricbuzz
title: Unofficial Cricbuzz

api_list.name: series/get-seasons
api_list.description: Get seasons related to specific series

required_parameters.name: seriesId
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../series/list or .../series/list-archives endpoints.

api_list.name: series/get-stats-filters

required_parameters.name: seriesId
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../series/list or .../series/list-archives endpoints.

api_list.name: matches/get-team

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The value of matchId field returned in .../matches/list, .../matches/get-schedules, .../series/get-matches, .../teams/get-schedules, .../teams/get-results, .../venues/get-matches endpoints.

required_parameters.name: teamId
required_parameters.description: The value of teamId returned in .../matches/get-info endpoint

api_list.name: matches/get-scorecard

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The value of matchId field returned in .../matches/list, .../matches/get-schedules, .../series/get-matches, .../teams/get-schedules, .../teams/get-results, .../venues/get-matches endpoints.

api_list.name: matches/get-hscorecard
api_list.description: Another endpoint to get match scorecard

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The value of matchId field returned in .../matches/list, .../matches/get-schedules, .../series/get-matches, .../teams/get-schedules, .../teams/get-results, .../venues/get-matches endpoints.

api_list.name: matches/get-highlights

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The value of matchId field returned in .../matches/list, .../matches/get-schedules, .../series/get-matches, .../teams/get-schedules, .../teams/get-results, .../venues/get-matches endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: iid
optional_parameters.description: innings Id (Ex : 1)

optional_parameters.name: htype
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings : 2-Fours|4-Sixes|8-Wickets|16-Fifties|32-Hundreds|128-Dropped catches|512-UDRS|1-Others

api_list.name: matches/get-overs

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The value of matchId field returned in .../matches/list, .../matches/get-schedules, .../series/get-matches, .../teams/get-schedules, .../teams/get-results, .../venues/get-matches endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: iid
optional_parameters.description: innings Id (Ex : 1)

optional_parameters.name: tms
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, leave empty to load the first page, or an Epoch timestamp value in milliseconds (Ex : 1640883600000) to load the next page. You are interested in the 'timestamp' field returned right in this endpoint.

api_list.name: matches/get-commentaries

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The value of matchId field returned in .../matches/list, .../matches/get-schedules, .../series/get-matches, .../teams/get-schedules, .../teams/get-results, .../venues/get-matches endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: tms
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, leave empty to load the first page, or an Epoch timestamp value in milliseconds (Ex : 1640883600000) to load the next page. You are interested in the 'timestamp' field returned right in this endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: iid
optional_parameters.description: innings Id (Ex : 1)

api_list.name: matches/get-info

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The value of matchId field returned in .../matches/list, .../matches/get-schedules, .../series/get-matches, .../teams/get-schedules, .../teams/get-results, .../venues/get-matches endpoints.

api_list.name: matches/get-schedules

required_parameters.name: matchType
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : international|league|domestic|women

optional_parameters.name: lastTime
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, leave empty to load the first page, or an Epoch timestamp value in milliseconds (Ex : 1640883600000) to load the next page. You are interested in the 'startDt' field returned right in this endpoint.

api_list.name: matches/list

required_parameters.name: matchState
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : live|recent|upcoming

api_list.name: matches/get-hcommentaries
api_list.description: Another endpoint used to get match commentaries

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The value of matchId field returned in .../matches/list, .../matches/get-schedules, .../series/get-matches, .../teams/get-schedules, .../teams/get-results, .../venues/get-matches endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: tms
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, leave empty to load the first page, or an Epoch timestamp value in milliseconds (Ex : 1640883600000) to load the next page. You are interested in the 'timestamp' field returned right in this endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: iid

api_list.name: matches/get-hhighlights

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The value of matchId field returned in .../matches/list, .../matches/get-schedules, .../series/get-matches, .../teams/get-schedules, .../teams/get-results, .../venues/get-matches endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: iid

optional_parameters.name: htype

api_list.name: get-image
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get image by id

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of imageId, faceImageId, etc... returned in other endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: p
optional_parameters.description: Specify size of image. One of the following : de|gthumb|thumb

api_list.name: stats/get-records

required_parameters.name: statsType
required_parameters.description: The value of 'value' field returned in .../stats/get-record-filters endpoint

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: Specify year to get records. Ex : 2021

optional_parameters.name: opponent
optional_parameters.description: The value of teamId field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: The value of teamId field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: matchType
optional_parameters.description: The value of matchTypeId field returned right in this endpoint

api_list.name: stats/get-icc-standings

required_parameters.name: matchType
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : 1-World test championship|2-World cup super league

optional_parameters.name: seasonId
optional_parameters.description: The value of seasonStandings/id field returned right in this endpoint

api_list.name: news/get-categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unofficial-cricbuzz.p.rapidapi.com/news/get-categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unofficial-cricbuzz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://unofficial-cricbuzz.p.rapidapi.com/news/get-categories"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: stats/get-record-filters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unofficial-cricbuzz.p.rapidapi.com/stats/get-record-filters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unofficial-cricbuzz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: stats/get-icc-rankings

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : batsmen|bowlers|allrounders|teams

required_parameters.name: formatType
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : test|odi|t20 (if isWomen parameter is 1, there will be no odi)

optional_parameters.name: isWomen
optional_parameters.description: Set to 1 to get rankings for women
